name: (2021AU-2-4) Escape Room Game
description:
This is a university-level student project, so please keep that in mind when leaving comments. Friendly, constructive feedback is of immense value to help our teams become more effective developers! We appreciate your time and attention as a player!

A first-person puzzle game where you play as a thief who got themselves stuck in a museum. Now with only you're wits about, you must use your environment to your advantage before the daylight comes and this museum will make you history. Tear down paintings, look for secret passages, and most importantly a way out.

(At the moment there is no pause button to let the player leave. Prepare to Ctrl+Alt+Delete for the mean time)

Katelyn, Omar S, Collin, Logan W, Zach A, Max P.
